text.section: Upon dissolution pursuant to KRS 275.285, a limited liability company may dispose of the known claims against it by filing, if required, articles of dissolution pursuant to KRS 275.315 and by following the procedures described in this section.
For purposes of this section, "claim" shall not include a contingent liability or a claim based on an event occurring after the effective date of dissolution.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 64, effective July 15, 1994.
